data.title: Passion of The New Eve
data.meta_description: Passion of the New Eve - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a summary of the plot of the novel "The Passion of New Eve" by Angela Carter. It follows the story of Evelyn, a misogynist man, who undergoes a forced sex change operation after being captured in the desert. He is renamed Eve and taken to an underground city inhabited solely by women, called Beulah, where he undergoes training to become a woman. Eve eventually escapes but is captured by Zero, a one-eyed, one-legged poet with multiple wives who he abuses. The story climaxes with Eve and Tristessa, a famous actress who is revealed to be a trans woman, confronting Zero at Tristessa's home.
